source_name: Bureau of Labor Statistics Key Indicators
name: Rate of injury and illness cases per 100 full-time workers for Nursing and residential care facilities, Private industry, California
description: Measure: Rate of injury and illness cases per 100 full-time workers; Case type: Cases involving days away from work, job restriction, or transfer; Industry: Nursing and residential care facilities; Supersector: Education and health services; Area: Private industry, California; Not Seasonally Adjusted; Source: BLS Injuries, Illnesses and Fatalities (IIF) program. For more information see http://www.bls.gov/iif/oshover.htm.
